DSM-IV Alcohol Dependence (AD) 1=yes, 0=no
variable.comment: Definition of DSM-IV Alcohol Dependence requires the presence of 3 dependence symptoms and the 'clustering' of at least 3 symptoms within one year - see also variable 'cluster'.
